content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-14.5, -48.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) extracting iron ore.
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5) storing extracted iron ore.
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5) transferring items between entities.
- Iron Chest at position (-14.5, -47.5) used for intermediate storage.
- Additional Stone Furnaces at positions (-11.0, -48.0) and (-9.0, -48.0) for increased smelting capacity.

### Coal and Iron Ore Extraction Site at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) extracting coal.
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Iron Chest at position (41.5, -80.5) storing coal.
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) transferring items between entities.
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -79.5) for additional storage.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces without available ingredients
- Ensure that the inventory contains the necessary ingredients before attempting to insert items into furnaces.

### Inserters waiting for source items
- Check that the source entities have the required items available for inserters to transfer. If inserters are waiting, ensure that the supply chain is not interrupted and that all entities are functioning correctly.

### Chest full warnings
- Regularly check and empty chests that are full to prevent interruptions in mining and production processes.
